turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like to place a pickup pizza order for a pizzeria called Bella Luna. Can you help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'm going to get three large pizzas, all of them with extra cheese, and two of them need to be veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and for the third pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, 3 large pizzas, 2 veggie lovers, one cheese, all with extra cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $75, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's perfect. Go ahead and place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, and you said for pick-up is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Thank you so much.
